name: Communal Sustain
summary: Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect.
description:
Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect. You must be within 30 feet of the chosen ally. The ally can Sustain the Spell once as a free action, triggered at the start of their next turn.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
